measured_by: time-to-goal in the virtual fractal-island navigation task
justification: The authors state that they conducted "a one-way repeated-measures ANOVA … on time-to-goal data (where lower scores reflect better performance)", using this latency as the index of how well participants navigated the environment.

measured_by: pattern of performance change across goal-change vs. structure-change conditions in block-based virtual navigation task
justification: They explain that "the mark of a hybrid decision-making strategy is the dissociation between adaptation to changes in the goal state versus changes to the structure of the environment," and analyze participants’ performance across different change conditions to infer which strategy was used.
